title: # 11 – Something’s Burning Uncut – Ari Shaffir & Steve Rannazzisi
description:
Somethings Burning uncut is the uncut audio from my cooking show "Something's Burning".

On this episode that originally aired July 2018 Steve Rannazzisi and Ari Shaffir come to my house and I try to make my own bacon cheeseburgers and hot dogs.

Subscribe to ATC on YouTube to never miss an episode of Something's Burning: http://bit.ly/SubscribeATC

View the Full Recipe here: http://bit.ly/4ThOfJulyRecipe

The Berty Boy Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
